title.en: Prayer for Lobzang Chödzin, Dharma Practitioner of Changra

text.en: Svasti!
text.en-trans: swasti

text.en: Glorious one who holds the victory banner of teaching and practice
text.en-trans: nyammé zetsang sé dang marmé dzé

text.en: In the Dharma tradition of the peerless son of Śuddhodana,1
text.en-trans: künkhyen nyipa lo zang drakpa yi

text.en: Dīpaṃkara2and the second omniscient one, Lobzang Drakpa—3
text.en-trans: shedrub chökyi gyaltsen dzinpé pal

text.en: Venerable guru, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: jetsün lamé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Supreme, unfailing refuge for all beings, infinite in number,
text.en-trans: tayé drowé lumé kyab kyi chok

text.en: With noble mind, as the excellent activity of all the victorious ones,
text.en-trans: lo zang gyalwa kün gyi dzepé pul

text.en: You preside auspiciously over the kingdom of Dharma—
text.en-trans: chö kyi gyalsi kyongwé getsen gyi

text.en: Glorious guru, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: palden lamé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: With this token deed, I dedicate all the virtue of the three times,
text.en-trans: di tsön dü sum namkar gewé tsok

text.en: So that I may always be guided and cared for by the gracious guru,
text.en-trans: ngödrub jungné drinchen lama yi

text.en: The source of all attainment, complete the paths and stages,
text.en-trans: dralmé jezung salam tarchin té

text.en: And swiftly attain the level of the three kāyas.
text.en-trans: ku sum gopang nyurdu tob chir ngo

text.en: May this region be free from every source of difficulty,
text.en-trans: yul chok dir yang tabtsö lonyé dang

text.en: Such as conflict, poor harvests, disease and epidemics.
text.en-trans: né rim lasok güpa kündral zhing

text.en: Let everyone enjoy long life, good health and prosperity,
text.en-trans: tsering nemé paljor longchö gyé

text.en: And oceans of auspiciousness fill the land in every direction.
text.en-trans: tashi gyatsö chok kün gangwar shok

text.en: In this dharma centre may the saṅgha always be harmonious,
text.en-trans: chö dra dir yang gendün tuktün zhing

text.en: Observe pure discipline and gain everything they might need.
text.en-trans: tsultrim namdak dögü jorwa gyé

text.en: Through their pursuit of learning and practice by day and night,
text.en-trans: shé dang drubpé nyintsen dawa yi

text.en: May Śākyamuni’s teachings flourish and endure long into the future.
text.en-trans: tubten dargyé yün ring né gyur chik
